autoinfo.name: num_divisions
autoinfo.description: Checks the number of divisions

autoinfo.name: has_focus_tree
autoinfo.description: Checks if a country has a specific focus tree

autoinfo.name: is_staging_coup
autoinfo.description: Checks if a country is staging a coup

autoinfo.name: has_full_control_of_state
autoinfo.description: Checks if country controls every province of a state

autoinfo.name: has_army_experience
autoinfo.description: Checks the amount of army xp

autoinfo.name: has_air_experience
autoinfo.description: Checks the amount of air xp

autoinfo.name: has_navy_experience
autoinfo.description: Checks the amount of navy xp

autoinfo.name: has_country_leader
autoinfo.description: Checks for a specific country leader
autoinfo.example: has_country_leader = { id = 17 ruling_only = yes name = "Boaty McBoatface" }

autoinfo.name: has_tech_bonus
autoinfo.description: Checks for a bonus for a single tech or a tech category

autoinfo.name: has_resources_amount
autoinfo.description: Checks the amount of resources in a state

autoinfo.name: num_of_subjects
autoinfo.description: Checks the number of subjects

autoinfo.name: num_tech_sharing_groups
autoinfo.description: Checks the amount of tech sharing a groups a country is in

autoinfo.name: compare_autonomy_progress_ratio
autoinfo.description: Checks the autonomy progress

autoinfo.name: ai_irrationality
autoinfo.description: Checks AI irrationality value

autoinfo.name: ai_liberate_desire
autoinfo.description: Checks how willing the AI is to liberate another country

autoinfo.name: always
autoinfo.description: Always returns specified value

autoinfo.name: any_claim
autoinfo.description: Checks for claims between two countries

autoinfo.name: any_war_score
autoinfo.description: Checks for war score in any ongoing war involving the country

autoinfo.name: armor
autoinfo.description: Checks for the average armor level of a combatant

autoinfo.name: can_research
autoinfo.description: Checks if a country can research a technology

autoinfo.name: controls_state
autoinfo.description: Checks if a country controls a state

autoinfo.name: country_exists
autoinfo.description: Checks if a specified country exists

autoinfo.name: date >, date <
autoinfo.description: Check for the current in-game date

autoinfo.name: dig_in
autoinfo.description: Checks for lowest dig-in level

autoinfo.name: distance_to
autoinfo.description: Checks distance between two states

autoinfo.name: divisions_in_state
autoinfo.description: Checks for the amount of division in state

autoinfo.name: exists
autoinfo.description: Checks if a country exists

autoinfo.name: fastest_unit
autoinfo.description: Checks if the fastest unit in combat has a certain speed value

autoinfo.name: focus_progress
autoinfo.description: Checks for the progress on a national focus

autoinfo.name: free_building_slots
autoinfo.description: Checks for the amount of free building slots
autoinfo.example: any_owned_state = { free_building_slots = { building = industrial_complex size > 0 include_locked = yes } }

autoinfo.name: frontage_full
autoinfo.description: Checks for full frontage in combat

autoinfo.name: gives_military_access_to
autoinfo.description: Checks if a country is giving military access to another country

autoinfo.name: hardness
autoinfo.description: Checks lowest/highest hardness level in combat

autoinfo.name: has_added_tension_amount
autoinfo.description: Variable for how much world tension a country has caused ( 1.0 = 100% )

autoinfo.name: has_annex_war_goal
autoinfo.description: Checks if a country has the annex wargoal towards another country

autoinfo.name: has_army_manpower
autoinfo.description: Variable for the amount of manpower a country has deployed in divisions

autoinfo.name: has_army_size
autoinfo.description: Checks the amount of all or certain division

autoinfo.name: has_available_idea_with_traits
autoinfo.description: Checks if a country has ideas with specified traits available

autoinfo.name: has_built
autoinfo.description: Checks if a country has built a certain number of specified buildings after taking a goal

autoinfo.name: has_capitulated
autoinfo.description: Checks if a country has capitulated

autoinfo.name: has_carrier_airwings_on_mission
autoinfo.description: Checks if carrier airwings are on a mission

autoinfo.name: has_civil_war
autoinfo.description: Checks if a country is a participant in a civil war

autoinfo.name: has_combat_modifier
autoinfo.description: Checks for a combat modifier in combat

autoinfo.name: has_completed_focus
autoinfo.description: Checks if a national focus has been completed

autoinfo.name: has_country_flag
autoinfo.description: Checks for a country flag

autoinfo.name: has_defensive_war
autoinfo.description: Checks if in a defensive war

autoinfo.name: has_defensive_war_with
autoinfo.description: Checks for a defensive war against a country

autoinfo.name: has_deployed_air_force_size
autoinfo.description: Variable for a country's amount of deployed planes

autoinfo.name: has_equipment
autoinfo.description: Checks for the amount of equipment

autoinfo.name: has_flanked_opponent
autoinfo.description: Check if flanking an enemy

autoinfo.name: has_global_flag
autoinfo.description: Checks if a global flag is active

autoinfo.name: has_government
autoinfo.description: Checks a country's current ideology

autoinfo.name: has_guaranteed
autoinfo.description: Checks if a country has guaranteed another country

autoinfo.name: has_idea
autoinfo.description: Checks for a specified idea

autoinfo.name: has_idea_with_trait
autoinfo.description: Checks for an idea with a specified trait

autoinfo.name: has_manpower
autoinfo.description: Checks the amount of manpower

autoinfo.name: has_manpower_for_recruit_change_to
autoinfo.description: Checks if country has enough manpower to change recruitment laws

autoinfo.name: has_max_planning
autoinfo.description: Checks for maximum planning bonus in combat

autoinfo.name: has_military_access_to
autoinfo.description: Checks if a country has military access to another country

autoinfo.name: has_national_unity
autoinfo.description: Variable for the national unity of a nation

autoinfo.name: has_navy_size
autoinfo.description: Variable for the amount of ships a nation has

autoinfo.name: has_offensive_war
autoinfo.description: Checks if in an offensive war

autoinfo.name: has_offensive_war_with
autoinfo.description: Checks for a offensive war against a country

autoinfo.name: has_opinion
autoinfo.description: Checks for the current opinion towards another country

autoinfo.name: has_opinion_modifier
autoinfo.description: Checks for a specific opinion modifier with another country

autoinfo.name: has_political_power
autoinfo.description: Checks the amount of political power

autoinfo.name: has_reserves
autoinfo.description: Checks for reserves in combat

autoinfo.name: has_start_date
autoinfo.description: Checks the initial start date of the current game

autoinfo.name: has_state_flag
autoinfo.description: Checks for a state flag

autoinfo.name: has_tech
autoinfo.description: Checks if a country has a specified tech

autoinfo.name: has_template_containing_unit
autoinfo.description: Checks if country has a template with specified units

autoinfo.name: has_trait
autoinfo.description: Checks if a leader has a trait

autoinfo.name: has_volunteers_from
autoinfo.description: Checks if a country has volunteer from another country

autoinfo.name: has_war
autoinfo.description: Checks if a country is at war

autoinfo.name: has_war_together_with
autoinfo.description: Checks if two countries are on the same side in a war

autoinfo.name: has_war_with
autoinfo.description: Checks if at war with specified country

autoinfo.name: has_war_with_amount
autoinfo.description: Checks the amount of wars and current world tension

autoinfo.name: ic_ratio
autoinfo.description: Compares the total industrial capacity of two countries

autoinfo.name: is_ai
autoinfo.description: Checks if a country is run by AI

autoinfo.name: is_amphibious_invasion
autoinfo.description: Checks if combat is an amphibious invasion

autoinfo.name: is_attacker
autoinfo.description: Checks if attacker in combat

autoinfo.name: is_border_conflict
autoinfo.description: Checks if a state is in border conflict

autoinfo.name: is_claimed_by
autoinfo.description: Checks if state is claimed by a country

autoinfo.name: is_coastal
autoinfo.description: Checks if a state is coastal

autoinfo.name: is_controlled_by
autoinfo.description: Checks if a state is controlled by a country

autoinfo.name: is_core_of
autoinfo.description: Checks if state is a core of a country

autoinfo.name: is_defender
autoinfo.description: Checks if a defender in combat

autoinfo.name: is_demilitarized_zone
autoinfo.description: Checks if a state is demilitarized

autoinfo.name: is_faction_leader
autoinfo.description: Checks if a country is a leader of any faction

autoinfo.name: is_fighting_air_units
autoinfo.description: Checks if fighting air units

autoinfo.name: is_fighting_in_terrain
autoinfo.description: Checks the terrain of combat

autoinfo.name: is_guaranteed_by
autoinfo.description: Checks if guaranteed by a specified country

autoinfo.name: is_in_faction
autoinfo.description: Checks if member of any faction

autoinfo.name: is_in_faction_with
autoinfo.description: Checks if in the same faction with a country

autoinfo.name: is_in_home_area
autoinfo.description: Checks if a state is connected to the capital

autoinfo.name: is_ironman
autoinfo.description: Checks if current game is in Ironman mode

autoinfo.name: is_lend_leasing
autoinfo.description: Checks if giving lend lease to a country

autoinfo.name: is_major
autoinfo.description: Checks if a country is a major

autoinfo.name: is_neighbor_of
autoinfo.description: Checks if neighbors with a specified country

autoinfo.name: is_on_continent
autoinfo.description: Checks the continent of a state

autoinfo.name: is_owned_by
autoinfo.description: Checks if a state is owned by a country

autoinfo.name: is_puppet
autoinfo.description: Checks if a country is a puppet (puppet specified in autonomy levels)

autoinfo.name: is_puppet_of
autoinfo.description: Checks if a county is a puppet of a specified country (puppet specified in autonomy levels)

autoinfo.name: is_subject
autoinfo.description: Checks if a country is a subject

autoinfo.name: is_subject_of
autoinfo.description: Checks if a country is a subject of a specified country

autoinfo.name: is_winning
autoinfo.description: Checks if winning in combat

autoinfo.name: land_doctrine_level
autoinfo.description: Checks researched land doctrine level

autoinfo.name: less_combat_width_than_opponent
autoinfo.description: Checks for combat width in combat

autoinfo.name: night
autoinfo.description: Checks if combat is at night

autoinfo.description: Checks the amount of unused civilian factories

autoinfo.name: num_of_available_military_factories
autoinfo.description: Check the amount of unused military factories

autoinfo.description: Checks the amount of unused naval dockyards

autoinfo.name: num_of_civilian_factories
autoinfo.description: Checks the amount of civilian factories in a country

autoinfo.name: num_of_controlled_states
autoinfo.description: Checks the number of controlled states

autoinfo.name: num_of_factories
autoinfo.description: Checks the total amount of factories

autoinfo.description: Checks the amount of military factories in a country

autoinfo.name: num_of_naval_factories
autoinfo.description: Checks the amount of naval dockyards in a country

autoinfo.name: num_of_nukes
autoinfo.description: Checks the amount of nukes

autoinfo.description: Checks the original tag of a country (for civil wars)

autoinfo.name: owns_state
autoinfo.description: Checks if a country owns a state

autoinfo.name: phase
autoinfo.description: Checks for a combat phase

autoinfo.name: recon_advantage
autoinfo.description: Checks for recon advantage in combat

autoinfo.name: region/area
autoinfo.description: Checks if a state is part of a specified strategic region

autoinfo.name: reserves
autoinfo.description: Checks the amount of reserves

autoinfo.name: ships_in_area
autoinfo.description: Checks the amount of ships in an area

autoinfo.name: ships_in_state_ports
autoinfo.description: Checks the number of ships in a state's provinces

autoinfo.name: skill
autoinfo.description: Checks leaders skill level

autoinfo.name: skill_advantage
autoinfo.description: Compares skill levels of commanders

autoinfo.name: state_population
autoinfo.description: Checks the states population

autoinfo.name: strength_ratio
autoinfo.description: Checks the relation of army strengths with a country

autoinfo.name: surrender_progress
autoinfo.description: Checks the surrender progress

autoinfo.name: tag
autoinfo.description: Checks the tag of the country

autoinfo.name: temperature
autoinfo.description: Checks for the temperature of a combat province
